I am very funny when it comes to blouses and the type of material they are made of. I've searched very hard for the righ blouses and took a chance on this brand. I was very surprised at how soft this blouse is. Polyester is the one for me but in this case this blouse is much more softer than others I have purchased. I will certainly buy more but the down side is...I will not purchase any more long sleeve blouses because they are very hard to iron without adding an additional crease. I recommend this blouse very much. Also I love the many colors to choose from.

I have them in blue, pink (which looks more lilac than pink), and white. They wear very comfortably and have a great fit. I'm 5'4, 140 lbs with a 41" chest, and the LARGE fits well. Just know that they need ironing. Not loving that. But overall, I'm satisfied with them. The seams are well sown and the fabric is not flimsy. Careful, it can snag if you have rough fingernails. All the best.

Upon taking it out of the plastic I noticed a snag on the shoulder which is very disappointing. Thankfully I ordered two. Other than that the fit is comfortable, the color is great and I love the material.
